effect.sword_shield: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

effect.legends_arceus: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

short_effect.sword_shield: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
